skills.name: Read File
skills.description: Read the contents of a file from the file system

skills.name: Write File

inputs.description: Absolute path where file should be written

inputs.name: content
inputs.description: Content to write to the file

inputs.description: Whether to overwrite existing file (default: false)

inputs.description: Must be true to actually commit

inputs.name: dryRun

inputs.description: Name of the agent to run (e.g., "organizer", "reflector")

inputs.name: wait
inputs.description: Whether to wait for agent to complete (default: false)
